shorts.title: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.2M in health care costs
shorts.title_distilled: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.
shorts.description: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs
shorts.content: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs
shorts.content_distilled: Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.

shorts.title_distilled: Two women and a service dog killed in machete attack, police say.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, Pa. (WNEP) - Two women were killed and another was hospitalized from a machete attack in Pennsylvania. Police in Scranton said they are still investigating the machete attack at the Hotel Jermyn apartments on Tuesday night. Two women and a service d…

shorts.title: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to Board of Directors
shorts.title_distilled: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A.
shorts.description: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.
shorts.content: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.

shorts.title: Young athletes sidelined after civic center damaged
shorts.title_distilled: Young athletes sidelined after civic center damaged.
shorts.description: SCOTT TOWNSHIP, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Some young athletes are sidelined this weekend after damage to a local civic center. Parents and coaches are forced to find other places for their kids to play until further notice. It's unclear how multiple windows ended up broken at the building in Lackawanna County, but 28/22 News spoke [...]

shorts.title: Runners, walkers shake off chills in Scranton event
shorts.title_distilled: Runners, walkers shake off chills in Scranton event.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Runners and walkers shook off the chill for an event in Scranton on Saturday. The Scranton Running Company hosted Shiver by the River. It's held two times a year, and has been happening for more than a decade. Participants could choose from a 5K or 10K, or a two-mile walk. [...]

shorts.description: ROARING BROOK TOWNSHIP, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Two people were taken to the hospital after a rollover crash Saturday afternoon, officials say. Lackawanna County officials confirmed with 28/22 News that authorities responded to the Scranton-Pocono Highway, near the Lake Scranton Parking lot in Roaring Brook Township, at 3:13 p.m. for a vehicle rollover crash. Authorities [...]

shorts.title: Lackawanna County, Scranton issue Code Blue
shorts.title_distilled: Lackawanna County, Scranton issue Code Blue.
shorts.description: LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Lackawanna County and the City of Scranton issued a Code Blue Frigid Weather Alert for Sunday and Monday nights. The alerts are issued for between 8:00 p.m. Sunday, Jan. 11, until 7:00 a.m. Monday, Jan. 12, and 8:00 p.m. Monday, Jan. 12, until 7:00 a.m. Tuesday, Jan. 13. St. Anthony’s Haven, [...]
shorts.content: LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Lackawanna County and the City of Scranton issued a Code Blue Frigid Weather Alert for Sunday and Monday nights. The alerts are issued for between 8:00 p.m. Sunday, Jan. 11, until 7:00 a.m. Monday, Jan. 12, and 8:00 p.m. Monday, Jan. 12, until 7:00 a.m. Tuesday, Jan. 13. St. Anthony’s Haven, [...]
shorts.content_distilled: LACKAWANNA COUNTY  — Lackawanna County and the City of Scranton issued a Code Blue Frigid Weather Alert for Sunday and Monday nights.
